You need to add toX and toY or it won’t trigger.

item.title: Mod place teleport
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

waht source are you using i would say do it like thisif (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffzone") && playerRights >= 1) { toX=XXXX; toY=YYYY; sM("To the land of admins."); }else{ sM("You must be staff to use this teleport"); }
Nothing fancy. no teleport emote. Its just for staff doesnt have to be the perfect tele. Plus you learn that every spot for a teleport is valuable as you never know when you will need one. Wasting one on something few people will use is pointless. Keep it command form.

Read full topic

item.title: Mod place teleport
item.dc:creator: @SheppehSays SheppehSays
item.description:
@SheppehSays wrote:

}
if(playerRights >= 1) {
triggering(2966, 9480, 0);
sM(“To the land of admins.”);
} else {
sM(“You cannot use this teleport you are not mod or admin”);
}
I made this myself,
I used the old code a bit from the help i got before
This time, when you click it… it teles you, and if your mod, it says “To the land of admins”
And if yur not it does the “else”.
I need a bit of help with it cause I cantfigure out why, It teles u to the jail location… And 2966, 9480, isnt jail location.
It teles you no matter what too.
Any help please?

Read full topic
